menu.title: Chef's Choice / Premium12
menu.description: An elegant, multi-course tasting that highlights seasonal ingredients and refined techniques. Perfect for intimate dinners or special celebrations.

menu.title: Modern Tasting Menu
menu.description: A curated 6–7 course degustation showcasing the chef’s signature dishes and inventive flavor pairings. Minimum group size advised for full experience.

menu.title: Family Style / Share Plates
menu.description: Relaxed communal dining with a selection of savory plates meant to be shared — approachable, delicious, and customizable.

menu.title: Blindfolded Dinner (Dine in the Dark)
menu.description: A sensory-focused 5-course experience guided by the chef — taste and texture take center stage in an unforgettable tasting.

menu.title: Events & Catering Menus
menu.description: Full-service catering packages for corporate events, weddings, and large gatherings — thoughtfully sourced and executed to your needs.

menu.title: Seasonal Specials & Add-ons
menu.description: Limited-time offerings and curated add-ons like sommelier pairing, on-site service staff, and decorative plating themes.

services.title: 3 to 5‑Course Modern Fine Dining
services.description: An unforgettable evening crafted to your tastes — seasonal ingredients, refined techniques and elegant plating.

services.title: Romantic Dinner with a Private Chef
services.description: A 5‑course fine‑dining experience tailored for two. Celebrate with a bouquet of red roses and chilled French champagne.
details: Bouquet of red roses & French champagne

services.title: Chef's Choice / Premium Degustation
services.description: A curated 7‑course dégustation spotlighting signature dishes and inventive pairings. Designed around your preferences.

services.title: Family Style Share Plates
services.description: Seven gourmet dishes served family‑style. A convivial, customizable feast with something for every guest.

services.title: Blindfolded Dinner — Dine in the Dark
services.description: A sensory 5‑course journey guided by your chef. Explore textures and flavors without sight — unforgettable.
